text:
@chuckwoolery @rhowardbrowne @gatewaypundit A medical doctor LIED on national TV for weeks about contracting the Coronavirus & he didnt even take a valid COVID-19 test? 
This is for all of the people who try to tell me to shut up because I dont know what I’m talking about or who claim I’m unqualified to apply common sense!
